overview: When the final bell rings and the herd of students clears the halls, these girls get ready for their extracurricular activities: sucking, fucking and jerking cocks! Five of the tiniest, sexiest and horniest teens ever take advantage of empty classrooms and bathrooms for their sex study sessions. Two girls even get their tight assholes stretched wide! Heather and her boyfriend give nerd Ava the fucking of her life, and Gina and Trinity seduce their poor teachers into giving them good grades. It's the kinkiest class yet in After School Slut Club 3.
title: After School Slut Club 3
